programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Magic Trick / Paddington and Poor Mr Curry) S1 (3/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Magic Trick / Paddington and Poor Mr Curry»Mr. Gruber gives Paddington a box of Magic tricks, but Paddington cannot master the tricks until he learns to practice, practice, practice. // Mr. Curry is ill and Paddington decides to nurse him back to health with his own recipe for onion soup.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Panddington and the Treehouse / Paddington and the Monster Hunt) S1 (n°4)
programme.desc: «Panddington and the Treehouse / Paddington and the Monster Hunt»Mr. Brown is worried he won't get sleep since the kids will be scared camping in the treehouse. Paddington wants to prove him wrong but there is a lightning storm. // There's a monster in Paddington's room and Mrs. Bird takes him on a monster hunt.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et le défi scout) S1 (23/54)
programme.desc: «Paddington et le défi scout»Jonathan and Paddington must get their Ranger badges but Mr. Curry is not happy with them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Une promenade à vélo) S2 (33/52)
programme.desc: «Une promenade à vélo»Peppa and her family are going for a day's cycle ride. Peppa rides her little bicycle. Mummy and Daddy Pig ride their tandem, with George on the back. Peppa loves cycling downhill but she's not so keen on peddling uphill. So, when the family meet all of Peppa's friends and decide to have a race, Peppa insists it should be a down hill race.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le patin à glace) S2 (34/52)
programme.desc: «Le patin à glace»When Peppa's friends come to play in her tree house, it's super fun, but when the boys come, things go wrong. Peppa unceremoniously puts them out. Grandpa knows what to do and builds a castle hut for the boys, but whether it makes it more fun?

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (Le super outil d'espions) S6 (n°29)
programme.desc: «Le super outil d'espions»When supervillain Dr. Coldfinger takes Curly Q's newest invention, the Ultra Spy Tool, Secret Agents Molly, Goby and Spy Pup must travel across the world to find and infiltrate his North Pole lair with regular tools to save the day!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Blue au pays des dinosaures) S3 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Blue au pays des dinosaures»Blue's Dino Clues: It's a prehistoric game of Blue's Clues when a mysterious dinosaur egg falls out of the Skidoo Frame and starts to hatch! (S3, ep 2).

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (No Time Like the Present Store) S3 (n°3)
programme.desc: «No Time Like the Present Store»At the Present Store, Joe's running a contest, whoever guesses the mystery present gets to unwrap it! What could be inside this special gift?! We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Santiago et Bonnie à la rescousse / La disparition de la boussole magique) S1 (18/21)
programme.desc: «Santiago et Bonnie à la rescousse / La disparition de la boussole magique»After getting stranded at the bottom of a crevice, Bonnie and Santiago must team up to save the day. // Santiago is on a mad dash to get his compass back after it's nabbed by Bonnie Bones and Sir Butterscotch.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Trojan Sea Horse) S1 (n°12)
programme.desc: «Trojan Sea Horse»Bonnie Bones is on the run with the museum's priceless treasures, but Santi and crew won't let her get far.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le trésor légendaire) S1 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Le trésor légendaire»After finding a map to the Legendary Loot, the Shark family splits up to hunt the treasure down.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Best Fin-Ship Day) S1 (n°19)
programme.desc: «Best Fin-Ship Day»Best Fin-Ship Day: Baby Shark tries to give William the best Best Fin-ship Day ever. (S1, ep 17a).

programme.title: Mini Chef (S'Mores / Guacamole) S1 (n°1)
programme.desc: «S'Mores / Guacamole»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Sauvetage en montagne / Le monstre des neiges) S1 (6/26)
programme.desc: «Sauvetage en montagne / Le monstre des neiges»Ryder and the PAW Patrol need to rescue Alex on Jakes mountain. // The pups find strange footprints in the snow on the mountain outside Adventure Bay. Everyone thinks it's a "snow monster" and it's scaring the skiers away.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Le valet de Paddington) S2 (22/27)
programme.desc: «Le valet de Paddington»Paddington's Butler: Mr. Curry ends up being Paddington's butler for the day - but he's better giving orders than taking them (S2, ep 22b).

programme.title: Peppa Pig (A la plage) S1 (46/52)
programme.desc: «A la plage»Peppa and her family go to the beach. There they do all kinds of things, such as digging Papa Pig in the sand. When it's time to go home, they almost leave without Papa Big, because he has fallen asleep.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Madame Patte géante) S1 (47/52)
programme.desc: «Madame Patte géante»George finds a spider in the bathroom sink. Peppa is very scared until she realizes he doesn't want to harm her.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le bateau de papi) S1 (48/52)
programme.desc: «Le bateau de papi»Peppa and George go for a ride in Grandpa Pig's boat. Danny Dog and Granddad Dog are also out sailing. Grandpa Pig and Granddad Dog race their boats to see which is fastest.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Strawberries) S1 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Strawberries»Anna and Froga are excited to make the best strawberry pie ever with the first strawberries of the season. Anna makes a plan to distract Christopher while they make the pie!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Swing) S1 (n°2)
programme.desc: «The Swing»When Anna and Froga discover the old seat of their swing, they are excited to hang it on the apple tree. But the ropes to attach it have gone missing!The two friends' search for the missing ropes turns out to be more difficult than they had imagined!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Cache-cache avec Blue) S2 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Cache-cache avec Blue»Josh, Blue, and all our friends are playing Hide and Seek, and Blue knows the BEST hiding spot! As we play Blue's Clues to figure out the best place to hide, we search for our hiding friends and play Snail and Seek with Magenta and Blue.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save Katie and Some Kitties / Pups Save Helo Humdinger) S9 (n°17)
programme.desc: «Pups Save Katie and Some Kitties / Pups Save Helo Humdinger»When Mayor Humdinger tricks Katie into watching his kitties, an alarm is set off and the Paw Patrol must rescue them. // Mayor Humdinger swipes one of Ryder's early inventions - an aircraft and must be rescued from an out-of-control flight.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Picote-Pattes le fantôme) S8 (14/24)
programme.desc: «Picote-Pattes le fantôme»Pups Vs. Ouchy Paws: Sid Swashbuckle pretends to be a legendary ghost so that he can take Danny's new skateboard. (S8, ep 14a).

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Les Super Clones / Mise en boîte) S1 (n°11)
programme.desc: «Les Super Clones / Mise en boîte»In order to win the Citizen of the Year, Sir Steel and Professor Scratch create holograms doubles of Deer Squad who cause chaos all around. // It's Recycling Day and Sir Steel puts the whole town in cardboard boxes with his Box-ooka device.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Le Poisson légendaire / Bulles à gogo) S1 (n°3)
programme.desc: «Le Poisson légendaire / Bulles à gogo»When Ian is on holidays, Lola takes over as a park ranger for a day, but that is not easy. Mister Staal tries to clean Middenbos with a huge soap machine and creates one big bubble nightmare!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Makes Pancakes / Paddington Plays Football) S1 (4/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Makes Pancakes / Paddington Plays Football»The Adventures of Paddington is a new version of a familiar bear. It's a heartwarming show about being curious, being good to others, and being part of a loving family.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Bread) S1 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Bread»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (L'océan fuchsia / Zéro déchet) S1 (n°15)
programme.desc: «L'océan fuchsia / Zéro déchet»Chemical sprays are making the countryside rosy! The Barbapapas' build an aviary to protect sick birds. // When they see a beach covered with rubbish, the Barbapapa family decides to clean the beach and use the trash to make a miniature golf course.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Hiccupism / Silence please) S1 (n°16)
programme.desc: «Hiccupism / Silence please»Barbabeau can't paint. He has a hiccup he can't get rid of. Just when he's about to give up, he accidentally creates a new artistic movement. // Barbalib wants to compete in a writing contest but his brothers and sisters stop her from concentrating.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (William, le grand reporter / Au lit, Baby Shark) S1 (n°18)
programme.desc: «William, le grand reporter / Au lit, Baby Shark»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Best Fin-Ship Day) S1 (n°19)
programme.desc: «Best Fin-Ship Day»Best Fin-Ship Day: Baby Shark tries to give William the best Best Fin-ship Day ever. (S1, ep 17a).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Smile Day) S1 (n°53)
programme.desc: «Smile Day»When Froga discovers that someone has scribbled a horrible frowny face one of her pumpkins in her garden, Anna and her are quite upset - especially since today is smile day!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (King for a Day) S1 (n°41)
programme.desc: «King for a Day»Today the friends play King For A Day, someone throws the crown on Christopher's head! Then the crown leaves his head and ends on his cousin, Benjy, who just came for a day visit. Benjy only wants to play with his cousin, and do whatever he wants.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Detectives) S1 (n°3)
programme.desc: «The Detectives»Froga is desperate. Her favourite toy Super Pebble has disappeared! Now Anna and Ron work with Froga play detectives. Thanks to a thoughtful gift from Christopher, Froga ends up finding her missing Super stone herself!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Super Christopher) S1 (n°4)
programme.desc: «Super Christopher»Christopher visits Anna with his " Super Christopher" costume, ready for adventure! But being a superhero comes with a whole set of challenges. Christopher isn't just a superhero. He's also a super friend.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Anna's Horse) S1 (n°30)
programme.desc: «Anna's Horse»Anna joins her friends to a game of riddle. Not only can she not "neigh" like a horse, she can't even make a loud sound. Bubu helps Anna with a Horse toy that makes the perfect "neigh" sound- perfect plan until they lose control of the toy!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Secrets Box) S1 (n°31)
programme.desc: «The Secrets Box»Froga is discussing the notion of secrets with Christopher. She can't keep secrets as they are a burden for her. Anna makes a secrets box where all the friends put their secret inside to feel better!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le Supermarché) S1 (49/52)
programme.desc: «Le Supermarché»Peppa and her family go to the grocery store for some tomatoes, spaghetti, onions and fruit, but Daddy Pig gets some chocolate cake for the kids.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Mon anniversaire) S1 (50/52)
programme.desc: «Mon anniversaire»It is Peppa's birthday, and Peppa has a party.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Emilie Eléphant) S2 (2/52)
programme.desc: «Emilie Eléphant»Emilie Eléphant, une petite nouvelle, vient d'arriver à la garderie. Elle est assez timide...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'ami de George) S2 (6/52)
programme.desc: «L'ami de George»Après avoir regardé leur émission de télévision préférée, Peppa et George veulent, eux-aussi, devenir des détectives fameux. Papa Pig leur donne un mystère à élucider...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le trésor de pirate) S4 (52/52)
programme.desc: «Le trésor de pirate»Pirate Peppa and friends put together a chest of treasure and bury it in a marked spot. Soon Pedro needs to follow the trail as he realises he has lost something.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Where Did It Go Barbabravo? / The Big Bad Hen) S1 (n°17)
programme.desc: «Where Did It Go Barbabravo? / The Big Bad Hen»Like a secret agent, Barbabravo leads the investigation equipped with his gadgets to find out who stole Barbapapa's cake.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Le plus tendre des liens / L'empire orange) S1 (5/52)
programme.desc: «Le plus tendre des liens / L'empire orange»While the family makes pottery, Barbabravo and Barbabright try to set the world record for the largest cheese soufflé. // The Barbapapas decide to go to the park. While her brother and sisters play , Barbalib can't help to control everything.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Jouets turbulents !) S5 (6/20)
programme.desc: «Jouets turbulents !»Blaze and Watts go with AJ and Gabby to their favorite store: a toy store. There they discover a machine that makes toys. The toy machine has a red button that you cannot press. And what does Crusher do?

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (L'île au trésor perdu) S5 (1/20)
programme.desc: «L'île au trésor perdu»Somewhere, on The Island of Lost Treasure, there are incredible riches just waiting to be discovered. And Blaze and Darington are determined to be the first to find them!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Les Bébés Tortues de Mer / La baleine échouée) S1 (2/26)
programme.desc: «Les Bébés Tortues de Mer / La baleine échouée»102A - PUPS SAVE THE SEA TURTLES The PAW Patrol pups are playing at the beach when they discover - SEA TURTLE HATCHLINGS! - But the turtles have no way to cross the road and get to the water. Ryder and pups must make them a safe route to the bay. 102B - PUPS AND THE VERY BIG BABY A baby whale has beached itself in Adventure Bay and Ryder and PAW Patrol race to the rescue. With the help of the PAW Patrol the baby whale makes it to the water's edge and swims out to his Mom. Good job Paw Patrol!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pop Pop Boogie / La Lumière du Phare) S1 (4/26)
programme.desc: «Pop Pop Boogie / La Lumière du Phare»104A - PUP PUP BOOGIE The PAW Patrol must work quickly to fix the tracks and remove a train car at the Adventure Bay Train Station, before the next train comes. But when Rubble hurts his PAW, Ryder has to teach Chase how to use Rubble's digger using some moves from the pups favorite dance game PUP PUP BOOGIE!104B - PUPS IN THE FOG When the bulb in the Adventure Bay lighthouse goes out, Ryder and the PAW Patrol battle the clock and thick fog as they try to fix the light in time to get their good friend Cap'n Turbot back home safely.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Kai Express / Ducknado) S1 (4/15)
programme.desc: «Kai Express / Ducknado»When Kai joins all the deer's carts together, the vehicles end up as a runaway train in the Central Forest! // Sir Steel's super powerful hairdryer creates a giant tornado that sucks up Ian, his ducklings and a heap of other things.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Every Cloud) S2 (n°11)
programme.desc: «Every Cloud»Bobbi wants to spend time with Jade, but there are candy floss clouds to worry about first!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Magic Trick / Paddington and Poor Mr Curry) S1 (3/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Magic Trick / Paddington and Poor Mr Curry»Mr. Gruber gives Paddington a box of Magic tricks, but Paddington cannot master the tricks until he learns to practice, practice, practice. // Mr. Curry is ill and Paddington decides to nurse him back to health with his own recipe for onion soup.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Panddington and the Treehouse / Paddington and the Monster Hunt) S1 (n°4)
programme.desc: «Panddington and the Treehouse / Paddington and the Monster Hunt»Mr. Brown is worried he won't get sleep since the kids will be scared camping in the treehouse. Paddington wants to prove him wrong but there is a lightning storm. // There's a monster in Paddington's room and Mrs. Bird takes him on a monster hunt.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La peinture) S2 (29/52)
programme.desc: «La peinture»When he sees Peppa and George paint diligently, Papa Pig gets back to the painting taste. Together with Peppa and George, he creates a beautiful work of art in the garden. Until the ducks come ...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La pendule à coucou) S2 (30/52)
programme.desc: «La pendule à coucou»The old cuckoo clock in Peppa and George's bedroom hasn't worked for sometime. So, Daddy Pig winds it up. The clock strikes the hour and a wooden cuckoo pops out, flapping its wings and singing "Cuckoo!!" Peppa thinks it is very funny, but George was looking the wrong way and has missed the whole thing. George does not want to miss the cuckoo again but the cuckoo only pops out once an hour...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Une promenade à vélo) S2 (33/52)
programme.desc: «Une promenade à vélo»Peppa and her family are going for a day's cycle ride. Peppa rides her little bicycle. Mummy and Daddy Pig ride their tandem, with George on the back. Peppa loves cycling downhill but she's not so keen on peddling uphill. So, when the family meet all of Peppa's friends and decide to have a race, Peppa insists it should be a down hill race.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le patin à glace) S2 (34/52)
programme.desc: «Le patin à glace»When Peppa's friends come to play in her tree house, it's super fun, but when the boys come, things go wrong. Peppa unceremoniously puts them out. Grandpa knows what to do and builds a castle hut for the boys, but whether it makes it more fun?

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (Le super outil d'espions) S6 (n°29)
programme.desc: «Le super outil d'espions»When supervillain Dr. Coldfinger takes Curly Q's newest invention, the Ultra Spy Tool, Secret Agents Molly, Goby and Spy Pup must travel across the world to find and infiltrate his North Pole lair with regular tools to save the day!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Blue au pays des dinosaures) S3 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Blue au pays des dinosaures»Blue's Dino Clues: It's a prehistoric game of Blue's Clues when a mysterious dinosaur egg falls out of the Skidoo Frame and starts to hatch! (S3, ep 2).

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (No Time Like the Present Store) S3 (n°3)
programme.desc: «No Time Like the Present Store»At the Present Store, Joe's running a contest, whoever guesses the mystery present gets to unwrap it! What could be inside this special gift?! We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Santiago et Bonnie à la rescousse / La disparition de la boussole magique) S1 (18/21)
programme.desc: «Santiago et Bonnie à la rescousse / La disparition de la boussole magique»After getting stranded at the bottom of a crevice, Bonnie and Santiago must team up to save the day. // Santiago is on a mad dash to get his compass back after it's nabbed by Bonnie Bones and Sir Butterscotch.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Trojan Sea Horse) S1 (n°12)
programme.desc: «Trojan Sea Horse»Bonnie Bones is on the run with the museum's priceless treasures, but Santi and crew won't let her get far.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le trésor légendaire) S1 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Le trésor légendaire»After finding a map to the Legendary Loot, the Shark family splits up to hunt the treasure down.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Best Fin-Ship Day) S1 (n°19)
programme.desc: «Best Fin-Ship Day»Best Fin-Ship Day: Baby Shark tries to give William the best Best Fin-ship Day ever. (S1, ep 17a).

programme.title: Mini Chef (S'Mores / Guacamole) S1 (n°1)
programme.desc: «S'Mores / Guacamole»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Sauvetage en montagne / Le monstre des neiges) S1 (6/26)
programme.desc: «Sauvetage en montagne / Le monstre des neiges»Ryder and the PAW Patrol need to rescue Alex on Jakes mountain. // The pups find strange footprints in the snow on the mountain outside Adventure Bay. Everyone thinks it's a "snow monster" and it's scaring the skiers away.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Le valet de Paddington) S2 (22/27)
programme.desc: «Le valet de Paddington»Paddington's Butler: Mr. Curry ends up being Paddington's butler for the day - but he's better giving orders than taking them (S2, ep 22b).

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le coucher) S2 (14/52)
programme.desc: «Le coucher»Il est presque l'heure d'aller se coucher. George et Peppa, qui jouaient dehors, doivent rentrer pour prendre un bain. Après s'être brossé les dents, ils se mettent au lit et Papa Pig leur lit une histoire. Papa Pig et Maman Pig s'installent devant la télévision mais ils ont sommeil après cette longue journée...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'embouteillage) S2 (13/52)
programme.desc: «L'embouteillage»Granny et Grandpa Pig ont invité Peppa, George et ses parents à déjeuner mais, sur le trajet, la famille se retrouve bloquée dans un embouteillage. Comme ils ne sont pas arrivés alors que le repas est prêt, Grandpa Pig décide de le leur apporter dans sa brouette...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les flaques d'eau de mer) S2 (10/52)
programme.desc: «Les flaques d'eau de mer»Granny Pig et Grandpa Pig ont emmené Peppa et George à la plage. Les enfants trouvent des flaques d'eau de mer et Peppa vient au secours d'un petit poisson qui était prisonnier de l'une d'elles. Elle le rejette à la mer et entreprend de creuser son propre petit bassin d'eau de mer...

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Photo) S1 (n°5)
programme.desc: «The Photo»Polaroid camera, she decides to take pictures of all her friends. Everyone thinks it's a great idea and Anna makes some great portraits. But things get complicated when she tries to take a group shot of everyone!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (We Love Nature) S1 (n°6)
programme.desc: «We Love Nature»Anna and her friends are planning an amazing picnic in nature. But Bubu's bag is too heavy, Christophe can't resist eating all the strawberries! A thunder makes things worse. Luckily, Anna's living room makes a great camp site!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Perfect Dinner / The Kittens) S1 (n°13)
programme.desc: «The Perfect Dinner / The Kittens»Barbapapa and Barbamama go out to celebrate their birthdays. Barbabelle is in charge and gets overwhelmed. // Barbabelle watches Bali's kittens. She's scared something will happen and won't let them out. Barbamama must intervene to help the kittens.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Le restaurant de Blue) S2 (6/21)
programme.desc: «Le restaurant de Blue»Welcome to Blue's Bistro - a very fancy restaurant! While playing Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to eat, we help Josh take our friends' orders and skidoo to Farmer Goat's farm to retrieve fresh vegetables!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (PAW Patrol: Mighty Pups) S5 (n°29)
programme.desc: «PAW Patrol: Mighty Pups»When their latest scheme goes awry, Mayor Humdinger and his nephew Harold accidentally divert a meteor towards Adventure Bay. The meteor's golden energy grants the PAW Patrol superpowers! The heroic MIGHTY PUPS are on a roll to super-save the day!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Donut Panic) S1 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Donut Panic»Donut Panic: Rammy's tips on focus and meditation come in handy when Sir Steel's Replicator causes havoc in the Central Forest with giant donuts. (S1, ep 5a).

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Finds a Hobby / Paddington and the Stamp) S1 (2/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Finds a Hobby / Paddington and the Stamp»Paddington does not have a hobby like all of the Browns, but Mrs. Brown finds out what Paddington is good at. // Paddington gets his arm stuck in a post box after accidentally using Mr. Gruber's rare Penny Black stamp on his letter to Aunt Lucy.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Metal Detector) S1 (30/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Metal Detector»Paddington is given a Metal detector by Mr. Gruber. Beep beep beep what has Paddington found now?

programme.title: Mini Chef (Banana) S1 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Banana»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Where Did It Go Barbabravo? / The Big Bad Hen) S1 (n°17)
programme.desc: «Where Did It Go Barbabravo? / The Big Bad Hen»Like a secret agent, Barbabravo leads the investigation equipped with his gadgets to find out who stole Barbapapa's cake.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Les sept aliments / Un portrait au poil) S1 (n°26)
programme.desc: «Les sept aliments / Un portrait au poil»The Barbababies think their food can make them change colours and shapes. They decide to find the right food for each of them. // Barbabeau lacks inspiration, he can't create anymore. The whole family helps by suggesting new subjects to paint.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Bataille de boules de neige / Le cadeau) S1 (n°15)
programme.desc: «Bataille de boules de neige / Le cadeau»Chucks tries to help Baby Shark and friends win the annual Snowball Bonanza in 'Snowball Bonanza', and in 'The Present', Baby Shark goes undercover to get the perfect gift for Mummy Shark. (S1, ep 15).

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Shark Strength) S1 (n°18)
programme.desc: «Shark Strength»Shark Strength: When a game of coral pins bowling gets out of fin, Baby must learn to control his shark strength. (S1, ep 16a).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (No Panic !) S1 (n°54)
programme.desc: «No Panic !»Christopher needs to warn Froga to protect her strawberries since he ears a thunderstorm coming! It turns out, the noise of thunder comes from Bubu's new invention: the weather machine!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Surprise) S1 (n°43)
programme.desc: «The Surprise»They decide to organise a surprise party on the hill. The organisation gets out of hand when Bubu's invitation cards fly away, Ron gets distracted in writing a heartfelt poem and Christopher tries to resist to eat the strawberry pie he baked.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Bicycle) S1 (n°9)
programme.desc: «The Bicycle»Bubu impresses his friends with a brand new bike he won in a contest. He encourages everyone else to ride it, Anna discovers why: Bubu doesn't know how to ride a two-wheeler!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Le ukulélé) S1 (10/78)
programme.desc: «Le ukulélé»Anna, Froga and Ron make up a song that Anna plays on her ukulele. But they accidentally end up breaking her cherished instrument in half! Ron and Froga do everything they can to stop Anna from finding out, finally they need to confess their mistake.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Bubu's Robot) S1 (n°32)
programme.desc: «Bubu's Robot»Bubu is understandably thrilled when he discovers his old toy robot that he converts into the FIX-IT-UP 5000. Anna, Froga, and Christopher are so impressed with his new fixer-upper robot, Bubu begins to think his friends like his robot more than him!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Froga's Choice) S1 (n°33)
programme.desc: «Froga's Choice»Froga can't decide which boots to wear for today's group photo with her friends. Anna, Ron, and Bubu try to help her decide, but it makes her decision-making more difficult!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La mare aux petits bateaux) S2 (12/52)
programme.desc: «La mare aux petits bateaux»En compagnie de sa famille et de ses amis, Peppa joue sur la mare avec de petits bateaux. Seule Rebecca Rabbit n'en possède pas...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Monsieur l'épouvantail) S2 (7/52)
programme.desc: «Monsieur l'épouvantail»Peppa et George sont allés rendre visite à leurs grands-parents. Grandpa Pig confectionne un épouvantail pour effrayer les corbeaux qui mangent ses récoltes...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La capsule du temps) S2 (9/52)
programme.desc: «La capsule du temps»A la garderie, madame Gazelle explique aux enfants ce qu'est une capsule du temps et en enterre une...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le recyclage) S2 (11/52)
programme.desc: «Le recyclage»Peppa et George aident Maman Pig à faire la vaisselle. Elle leur apprend alors à recycler les bouteilles ainsi que les journaux...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les avions en papier) S3 (50/52)
programme.desc: «Les avions en papier»Some of Daddy Pig's important work papers have gone missing - because Mummy Pig, Peppa and George have accidentally made them into paper airplanes.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Pour maman / Barbacarambolage) S1 (n°18)
programme.desc: «Pour maman / Barbacarambolage»The barbababies prepare a show for Barbamama's birthday. While Barbalala finishes up, they go to the carnival where Barbabeau gets stuck in an attraction. // Three separate stories telescope into a big final bouquet in the middle of the courtyard.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (It's Only a Mystery... / The Battle) S1 (6/52)
programme.desc: «It's Only a Mystery... / The Battle»Taking after his favourite detective, Barbabravo looks for a case to solve. Can he solve the mystery of the missing ice statue? // Inspired by their favourite heroes, the Barbababies make costumes. But no heroes are possible without villains...

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Au secours du chiot) S6 (7/24)
programme.desc: «Au secours du chiot»The Puppy Chase!: When a big bubble floats away with Gabby's new puppy, she'll team up with Blaze and AJ to get him back. (S6, ep 8).

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Le pouvoir du recyclage) S5 (8/20)
programme.desc: «Le pouvoir du recyclage»When Axle City is visited by a littering raccoon, it's up to Blaze to save the day as a Super Recycling Truck! He cleans up the town and rescues his friends - just in time for a final showdown with the Litter Critter!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La Cloche de Plongée / Les Castors) S2 (4/26)
programme.desc: «La Cloche de Plongée / Les Castors»Cap'n Turbot and his cousin Francois go deep sea diving to snap a picture of a rare seaslug - the only problem is their diving bell ends up stuck, and then the propeller fin breaks at the bottom of the bay! It's PAW Patrol to the rescue, and they have just the right vehicle - Zuma's new SUBMARINE! // A bad storm washes away Chompy the Beaver's dam, so he starts chomping on all the wood at Farmer Yumi's Farm! Ryder and the PAW Patrol have to fix the chomped Barn and Fence, but that's just the beginning. Chompy has been chowing down all over town! Chase has to track the busy Beaver, while the rest of the Pups help rebuild Chompy's home.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La Grande Vallée Sous la Neige / Le Match de Basketball) S2 (8/26)
programme.desc: «La Grande Vallée Sous la Neige / Le Match de Basketball»A winter ice storm causes trouble all over Adventure Bay. Mayor Goodway's car hit's an icy patch and gets stuck in the snow. The PAW Patrol races to the rescue, but the roads aren't the only thing affected by the ice. The Engineer's train can't break on the icy tracks and it's headed for a huge snow drift on the crossing! Ryder, Rubble, and EVEREST have to get there in time and clear out all the snow and ice! // Mayor Goodway challenges Mayor Humdinger's Basketball team to a game. The only thing Mayor Goodway is missing though is a...Basketball team! She calls Ryder and the PAW Patrol for help, and Ryder thinks the pups would make a great team! The pups become the Adventure Bay All-Stars and they'll need everyone, including a reluctant Marshall, to pitch in and help win one for Mayor Goodway and the town. Nothing but net!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La Créature du lac / Collés ensemble) S1 (n°6)
programme.desc: «La Créature du lac / Collés ensemble»A shipment of plastic is dumped in the Crystal Lake. A lake monster appears and Rammy must overcome his fear of rednessing everyone. When Lola and Mister Steel get stuck together, they are forced to work together.
